name: Recepta
description: Recepta offers a simple and scalable solution that automates the creation and collection of digital receipts for all card transactions on each purchase, eliminating the need for paper receipts. It refers to everyone who make purchases on credit or debit
one_liner: Recepta offers a simple and scalable solution that automates the creation and collection of digital receipts for all card transactions on each purchase, eliminating the need for paper receipts. It refers to everyone who make purchases on credit or debit
